question:
[Toni], who is the sister of [Sharon], is a lovely girl. [Jenny]'s father, [Cornelius], felt a wave of sadness when [Jenny] left for college. [April] began teaching her daughter, [Sharon], how to sew clothes. [April] had learned the trait from her father, [Cornelius].
Question: How is [Toni] related to [Jenny]?
